product_name: The North Face Sally Insulated Pants - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: From first run to the last, The North Face Sally insulated snow pants keep you warm while packing in the laps on the slopes. Durable nylon fabric features HyVent(R) waterproof breathable coating for superior weather protection; pants are fully seam sealed. Polyester taffeta lining easily slides over a base layer. Heatseeker(TM) insulation in the seat offers a great warmth-to-weight ratio and is highly compressible and is extremely durable, making it ideal for cold weather activities. Articulated knees aid in fit, allowing freedom of movement. StretchVent(TM) gaiters with elastic grippers keep secure over boots. Sally pants feature back pockets and zippered handwarmer pockets. Pant-a-lock compatible with coordinating The North Face jackets (coordinating jackets not included with the purchase of this item). Closeout.
short_description: From first run to the last, The North Face Sally insulated snow pants keep you warm while packing in the laps on the slopes.
